label: Integrated disturbance alerts
infoText: Monitor forest and other vegetation disturbances with four satellite-based alert systems in near-real time

label: GLAD-L
infoText: Identifies areas of likely tree cover loss in near-real time using Landsat imagery

label: GLAD-S2
infoText: Identifies areas of primary forest loss in near-real time using Sentinel-2 imagery

label: RADD
infoText: Identifies areas of primary forest loss in near-real time using Sentinel-1's cloud-penetrating radar sensors

label: DIST-ALERT
infoText: Identifies areas of likely vegetation loss in near-real time using Harmonized Landsat Sentinel-2 imagery
